description: The user asks to see the articles that were filtered out of their daily news digest due to low relevance. The assistant fetches RSS feeds, extracts article text, creates summaries, ranks them against the user’s interest profile, and finally returns the list of low‑relevance articles with their titles and concise summaries.

messages.content: You are an AI assistant for a Personalized News Digest service. Use the available tools to fetch RSS feeds, extract article content, summarise articles, rank them according to the subscriber's interest profile, and compose responses. When the user requests transparency about filtered‑out articles, identify which summaries were not selected by the ranking step and present their titles and summaries.
Hi, could you show me the articles that were filtered out of my daily digest because they were low relevance? I’d like to see their titles and a short summary for each.
Sure, I’ll pull the latest items from your subscribed feeds, summarise them, rank them against your interests, and then show you the ones that didn’t make the cut.

arguments.text: The AI chip breakthrough article content placeholder.
The climate model article content placeholder.
The markets rally article content placeholder.

summaries: Breakthrough in AI Chip Design – A new AI‑focused processor promises 3× faster inference while cutting power consumption, potentially reshaping data‑center workloads.
New Climate Model Predicts Faster Ice Melt – Researchers’ updated climate simulations show Antarctic ice could disappear 15 years earlier than previously thought, accelerating sea‑level rise.
Global Markets Rally After Policy Shift – Stock indexes surged worldwide after major economies announced coordinated fiscal stimulus, though analysts warn of underlying inflation risks.

messages.content: [{"title":"Breakthrough in AI Chip Design","link":"https://news.example.com/tech/ai-chip","publish_date":"2025-12-06"},{"title":"New Climate Model Predicts Faster Ice Melt","link":"https://news.example.com/science/climate-model","publish_date":"2025-12-05"},{"title":"Global Markets Rally After Policy Shift","link":"https://news.example.com/economy/markets-rally","publish_date":"2025-12-04"}]
The article explains how a new semiconductor architecture combines specialized tensor cores with on‑chip memory, delivering 3× the performance of previous generations while using 40% less energy.
Breakthrough in AI Chip Design – A new AI‑focused processor promises 3× faster inference while cutting power consumption, potentially reshaping data‑center workloads.

Scientists have updated their global climate model to include higher-resolution ocean‑ice interactions, indicating that Antarctic ice loss could accelerate, leading to sea‑level rise 15 years earlier than earlier projections.
New Climate Model Predicts Faster Ice Melt – Researchers’ updated climate simulations show Antarctic ice could disappear 15 years earlier than previously thought, accelerating sea‑level rise.

After coordinated fiscal stimulus announcements from the US, EU, and Japan, global equity markets rallied, with the S&P 500 up 2.3% and the Euro Stoxx 50 up 1.9%, though analysts caution that underlying inflation pressures remain high.
Global Markets Rally After Policy Shift – Stock indexes surged worldwide after major economies announced coordinated fiscal stimulus, though analysts warn of underlying inflation risks.
